name: Sava
appearance: Slim, ink-flecked hands, short curls pinned by copper clips, and a plain gray robe with hidden pockets of rolled vellum. Eyes flick between lips and ledgers.
character: Discreet and conscientious, she clings to oaths like lifelines and keeps panic folded into neat corners.
talents: Walks unheard in the Silent Archive
dreams: Compile a codex mapping all civic debts and oaths
Free the Silent Archive from factional leverage
secrets: Resisted a Night Orchard compromise but still passes them harmless rumors to keep them away
The whispering seep says her name and a date she fears
